name: Cubix Robots for Everyone: Showdown
description: Cubix Robots for Everyone: Showdown is a 2002 action-adventure role-playing video game released by Blitz Games. The game is based on the Cubix: Robots for Everyone television series. It is developed by Blitz Games, produced by 4Kids Entertainment, Daewon Media, and Cinepix and published by The 3DO Company.
